decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development shall be completed in the materials specified on the approved plans and within the planning application form, unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (OS, AL(00)00, EX_EL_E, EX_EL_N, EX_EL_S, EX_EL_W, EL_E, EL_N, EL_S, EL_W Received 12/02/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - No fans, louvres, ducts or other external plant shall be installed without the prior approval of the Local Planning Authority.
description: External alterations to existing office building.
